title: Standards of professional responsibility and
context: [ยง658G-13] Standards of professional responsibility and mandatory reporting not affected. This chapter does not affect: (1) The professional responsibility obligations and standards applicable to a lawyer or other licensed professional; or (2) The obligation of a person to report abuse or neglect, abandonment, or exploitation of a child or adult under the law of this State. [L 2012, c 207, pt of ยง1]
